message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $10000 is significantly below what this product is worth.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but I can't go lower than $12000.  This is a fair price considering the value you'll gain from owning it. What do you say?

I understand your perspective, but $12000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11000. I'm willing to compromise to get this deal done, but I really need to stay within my budget.
